name: Custom Application Development
desc: I can help with developing custom application and solution for web, mobile, and cloud.

name: Software and Cloud Architecture
desc: A good architecture will speed development, ease maintenance, result in robust operation, stronger security, and lower financial cost. I can help with architecting one.

name: Maintenance and Operation
desc: Leave maintenance and operations to me, so you can focus on your business.

name: Automation and Optimization
desc: Leave things that required fast response and repetition to automation. I can also help with performance, cost, and process optimization.

name: Analytics and Troubleshooting
desc: Going through data can be overwhelming. I can help with analytics of performance and data. Sometimes the more eyes the better, I can come along your team and help with troubleshooting.

name: Research and Proof of Concept
desc: Have an idea but not sure if it will work? I can help with in-depth research and proof of concept.
